description:
Enhance Visual Glow Effects on Landing and Authentication Pages

Improve the visual glow effects on the landing page and login/signup pages using frontend design expertise to create a more polished and appealing user interface.

Requirements:
- Review existing glow effects on landing page and identify areas for enhancement
- Review existing glow effects on login/signup pages and identify areas for enhancement
- Refine glow properties (color, intensity, blur radius, spread) for better visual appeal
- Ensure glow effects are consistent with the overall design system
- Optimize performance to prevent excessive repaints or layout shifts
- Test glow effects across different screen sizes and devices
- Verify accessibility (ensure glows don't interfere with text readability or contrast ratios)
- Consider dark mode compatibility if applicable

Technical Considerations:
- Use CSS box-shadow, filter effects, or canvas-based solutions as appropriate
- Ensure animations are smooth (60fps) and use GPU acceleration where possible
- Test on various browsers for consistent rendering
- Keep file sizes minimal if using image-based glows
title: Enhance visual glow effects on authentication pages
